description: Environmentalists are often regarded as people wanting to stop one thing or another and there are surely lots of things that ought to be stopped. The climate change conversation is always "halt this, stop that." Let's talk about new beginnings and reframe the problem as an opportunity. How do we move from fear to action to fearlessness?
title: The Regeneration: Shifting from Fear to Opportunity
eventImage: https://theassemblage.spaces.nexudus.com/en/events/getlargeimage?id=513220708&w=1500?t=The Regeneration: Shifting from Fear to Opportunity
